title: Lemon Herb Dressing
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, red wine vinegar, dry mustard, lemon-pepper seasoning, dry Italian herbs, granulated garlic, and Dijon mustard until fully combined.
Slowly drizzle in the olive oil while continuing to whisk, ensuring that the oil is fully incorporated and the dressing is emulsified.
Taste and adjust seasoning if needed. Use immediately or store in the refrigerator in a sealed container.
